command.text: select "ImpresstFundIOU"."ImpFundIOUID" "ImpFundIOUID" ,"ImpresstFundIOU"."ImpresstFundID" "ImpresstFundID" ,"ImpresstFund"."Reference" "ImpresstFundReference" ,"ImpresstFundAccSub"."AccSubName" "ImpresstFundAccSubAccSubName" ,"ImpresstFundAccSubAccSubType"."AccSubType" "ImpresstFundAccSubAccSubTypeAccSubType" ,"ImpresstFundAccSubType"."AccSubType" "ImpresstFundAccSubTypeAccSubType" ,"ImpresstFundCoaDetail"."AccName" "ImpresstFundCoaDetailAccName" ,"ImpresstFundCoaDetailAccBalType"."AccBalType" "ImpresstFundCoaDetailAccBalTypeAccBalType" ,"ImpresstFundCoaDetailAccCurrency"."AccCurrencyName" "ImpresstFundCoaDetailAccCurrencyAccCurrencyName" ,"ImpresstFundCoaDetailAccDest"."AccDest" "ImpresstFundCoaDetailAccDestAccDest" ,"ImpresstFundCoaDetailAccFund"."AccFundName" "ImpresstFundCoaDetailAccFundAccFundName" ,"ImpresstFundCoaDetailAccSubType"."AccSubType" "ImpresstFundCoaDetailAccSubTypeAccSubType" ,"ImpresstFundCoaDetailAccType"."AccType" "ImpresstFundCoaDetailAccTypeAccType" ,"ImpresstFundCoaDetailCoaControl"."AccName" "ImpresstFundCoaDetailCoaControlAccName" ,"ImpresstFundCoaDetailCoaMain"."AccName" "ImpresstFundCoaDetailCoaMainAccName" ,"ImpresstFundCoaDetailCoaSub"."AccName" "ImpresstFundCoaDetailCoaSubAccName" ,"ImpresstFundIOU"."AccSubTypeID" "AccSubTypeID" ,"AccSubType"."AccSubType" "AccSubTypeAccSubType" ,"ImpresstFundIOU"."AccSubCode" "AccSubCode" ,"AccSub"."AccSubName" "AccSubAccSubName" ,"AccSubAccSubType"."AccSubType" "AccSubAccSubTypeAccSubType" ,"ImpresstFundIOU"."IUODate" "IUODate" ,"ImpresstFundIOU"."IUOName" "IUOName" ,"ImpresstFundIOU"."Amount" "Amount" ,"ImpresstFundIOU"."TransactionType" "TransactionType" ,"ImpresstFundIOU"."PaymentMode" "PaymentMode" from "dbo"."ImpresstFundIOU" "ImpresstFundIOU" left join "dbo"."ImpresstFund" "ImpresstFund" on "ImpresstFundIOU"."ImpresstFundID" = "ImpresstFund"."ImpresstFundID" left join "dbo"."AccSubNames" "ImpresstFundAccSub" on "ImpresstFund"."AccSubCode" = "ImpresstFundAccSub"."AccSubCode" left join "dbo"."AccSubTypes" "ImpresstFundAccSubAccSubType" on "ImpresstFundAccSub"."AccSubTypeID" = "ImpresstFundAccSubAccSubType"."AccSubTypeID" left join "dbo"."AccSubTypes" "ImpresstFundAccSubType" on "ImpresstFund"."AccSubTypeID" = "ImpresstFundAccSubType"."AccSubTypeID" left join "dbo"."CoaDetail" "ImpresstFundCoaDetail" on "ImpresstFund"."CoaDetailID" = "ImpresstFundCoaDetail"."CoaDetailID" left join "dbo"."AccBalTypes" "ImpresstFundCoaDetailAccBalType" on "ImpresstFundCoaDetail"."AccBalTypeID" = "ImpresstFundCoaDetailAccBalType"."AccBalTypeID" left join "dbo"."AccCurrencys" "ImpresstFundCoaDetailAccCurrency" on "ImpresstFundCoaDetail"."AccCurrency" = "ImpresstFundCoaDetailAccCurrency"."AccCurrencyID" left join "dbo"."AccDests" "ImpresstFundCoaDetailAccDest" on "ImpresstFundCoaDetail"."AccDestID" = "ImpresstFundCoaDetailAccDest"."AccDestID" left join "dbo"."AccFunds" "ImpresstFundCoaDetailAccFund" on "ImpresstFundCoaDetail"."AccFundID" = "ImpresstFundCoaDetailAccFund"."AccFundID" left join "dbo"."AccSubTypes" "ImpresstFundCoaDetailAccSubType" on "ImpresstFundCoaDetail"."AccSubTypeID" = "ImpresstFundCoaDetailAccSubType"."AccSubTypeID" left join "dbo"."AccTypes" "ImpresstFundCoaDetailAccType" on "ImpresstFundCoaDetail"."AccTypeID" = "ImpresstFundCoaDetailAccType"."AccTypeID" left join "dbo"."CoaControl" "ImpresstFundCoaDetailCoaControl" on "ImpresstFundCoaDetail"."CoaControlID" = "ImpresstFundCoaDetailCoaControl"."CoaControlID" left join "dbo"."CoaMain" "ImpresstFundCoaDetailCoaMain" on "ImpresstFundCoaDetail"."CoaMainID" = "ImpresstFundCoaDetailCoaMain"."CoaMainID" left join "dbo"."CoaSub" "ImpresstFundCoaDetailCoaSub" on "ImpresstFundCoaDetail"."CoaSubID" = "ImpresstFundCoaDetailCoaSub"."CoaSubID" left join "dbo"."AccSubTypes" "AccSubType" on "ImpresstFundIOU"."AccSubTypeID" = "AccSubType"."AccSubTypeID" left join "dbo"."AccSubNames" "AccSub" on "ImpresstFundIOU"."AccSubCode" = "AccSub"."AccSubCode" left join "dbo"."AccSubTypes" "AccSubAccSubType" on "AccSub"."AccSubTypeID" = "AccSubAccSubType"."AccSubTypeID"

field.label: Impresst Fund Coa Detail Acc Bal Type

field.label: Impresst Fund Coa Detail Acc Currency Name

field.label: Impresst Fund Coa Detail Acc Dest

field.name: ImpresstFundCoaDetailAccFundAccFundName
field.label: Impresst Fund Coa Detail Acc Fund Name

field.name: ImpresstFundCoaDetailAccSubTypeAccSubType
field.label: Impresst Fund Coa Detail Acc Sub Type

field.name: ImpresstFundCoaDetailAccTypeAccType
field.label: Impresst Fund Coa Detail Acc Type

field.name: ImpresstFundCoaDetailCoaControlAccName
field.label: Impresst Fund Coa Detail Coa Control Acc Name

field.name: ImpresstFundCoaDetailCoaMainAccName
field.label: Impresst Fund Coa Detail Coa Main Acc Name

field.name: ImpresstFundCoaDetailCoaSubAccName
field.label: Impresst Fund Coa Detail Coa Sub Acc Name
